comments.author: HeavensPro
comments.body: Cheating likes and follows can lead not to a boost of your account but to the ban of it. I'll recommend you to find a good SMM manager instead of this type of getting likes and follows. Real people can be easily distinguished from bots trust me. Also it will be seen in your statistics as "traffic from nowhere" which is kinda suspiciously

comments.author: dtb.agency
comments.body: Quote from: zestVI on July 21, 2022, 09:46:44 AMany1 knows of any platform that sells likes and follows for crypto? i need something that has instagram available.Here you go – http://smm.infoP.S just check prices

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Be careful, as most (if not all) accounts that provide SMM service are SCAM accounts, they will ask you to pay small amounts, for example, to get a thousand likes and then run away with your money, so it is better to using escrow or not sending first at all.I know a member of this forum who has a long experience (offline since weeks,) but the question is how many views/likes do you need and the time period.

comments.author: dtb.agency
comments.body: Quote from: hugeblack on July 22, 2022, 12:31:27 PMBe careful, as most (if not all) accounts that provide SMM service are SCAM accounts, they will ask you to pay small amounts, for example, to get a thousand likes and then run away with your money, so it is better to using escrow or not sending first at all.I know a member of this forum who has a long experience (offline since weeks,) but the question is how many views/likes do you need and the time period.If you put whatever business instead of SMM, you would be right on 100% as well. Before buying 1r likes, followers or views, you need to learn about the services you work with.I assure that https://smm.info service is a trusted service with zero risks for users. We are working for several years and we know what's the real value behind whatever business - name and reputation.E.g. minimum deposit amount is 1$. Let me kindly remind the domain – it's smm.info. I hope noone thinks that we would scam anyone? Moreover, theoretically, we can give a free 1$ on balance if we see that it's not a "freebies hunter".

comments.author: zestVI
comments.body: how would instagrm know im buying these myself and ban the account? wouldnt that mean i can but these for any account out there and have it banned?im interested in a constant purchase of mostly story views if thats possible
